Speaking effectively is a key skill for psychologists, and in almost all professional careers. 
Practice is key, but there are also some key principles that can help you to improve your speaking skills.
In this theme we deal with how to structure presentations, how to use visual aids, and how engage an audience when speaking on specialist or technical topics.
